# UIPreviewAction.Style

**Enumeration**

The style for a peek quick action.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Overview

Use these styles with instances of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPreviewAction] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPreviewActionGroup] classes.

## Constants

- **UIPreviewAction.Style.default**: The default style.
- **UIPreviewAction.Style.selected**: The style for a selected peek quick action.
- **UIPreviewAction.Style.destructive**: The style for a peek quick action that changes or deletes data.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Creating a peek quick action

- **init(title:style:handler:)**: Creates a peek quick action using a specified title, style, and handler.
- **handler**: The block called when the peek quick action is selected by the user.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
